SEARCH
Package com.app.text.utility

Interface TextUtility

public interface TextUtility
Provides utility methods for text processing, including checking for anagrams, palindromes, and pattern matching.

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static boolean
    hasPattern(String txt, String pattern)
    Checks if a string contains a substring that matches a given regular expression pattern.
    static boolean
    isAnagram(String txt1, String txt2)
    Determines if two strings are anagrams of each other.
    static boolean
    isPalindrome(String txt)
    Checks if a string is a palindrome.

  • Method Details

    • isAnagram

      static boolean isAnagram(String txt1, String txt2)
      Determines if two strings are anagrams of each other. Two strings are considered anagrams if they contain the same characters with the same frequencies, but the order of characters may be different.
      Parameters:
      txt1 - the first string to compare
      txt2 - the second string to compare
      Returns:
      true if the two strings are anagrams, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either of the strings is null or empty, or if they have different lengths

    • isPalindrome

      static boolean isPalindrome(String txt)
      Checks if a string is a palindrome. A palindrome reads the same forward and backward when non-alphanumeric characters are ignored, and case is disregarded.
      Parameters:
      txt - the string to check
      Returns:
      true if the string is a palindrome, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the string is null or empty

    • hasPattern

      static boolean hasPattern(String txt, String pattern)
      Checks if a string contains a substring that matches a given regular expression pattern.
      Parameters:
      txt - the string to search
      pattern - the regular expression pattern to match
      Returns:
      true if the pattern is found in the string, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either the string or the pattern is null or empty
